text:
@sardesairajdeep Sir if a "Diya" cost Rs 5 then for 130crore people will burn Rs.650crore on 5th April. Instead every one will donate Rs 5 and contribute that Rs 650 crore in #COVID19 #PMCARESFund .. instead of enjoying it will be a service to nation.. just a proposal..

#IndiaFightsCorona
